_metadata.description: api-library operational requirements mapped to canonical PRD v2.0

requirements.title: Structured API metadata store
requirements.description: Persist provider, endpoint, pricing, rate-limit, and auth metadata for every tracked API.

requirements.title: Semantic capability search
requirements.description: Vector-search API descriptions/capabilities so agents can query by intent instead of keyword.

requirements.title: Credential readiness tracking
requirements.description: Track which APIs have credentials configured and expose readiness signals in UI/API.

requirements.title: Integration notes registry
requirements.description: Store notes, gotchas, and learnings per API with history for future operators.

requirements.title: Research-assistant ingestion
requirements.description: Ingest discoveries from research-assistant workflows and normalize them into the catalog.

requirements.title: Metadata lineage tracking
requirements.description: Capture creation/update timestamps plus source URLs for every API entry.

requirements.title: Scenario-facing REST API
requirements.description: Expose CRUD/search endpoints so scenarios can query and mutate the API catalog.

requirements.title: Operator web console
requirements.description: Provide a web UI for browsing, searching, editing, and monitoring APIs.

requirements.title: Redis caching layer
requirements.description: Serve frequently accessed APIs via Redis to reduce latency and load on Postgres.

requirements.title: Automated pricing refresh
requirements.description: Fetch pricing data from source URLs every 24 hours and flag deltas.

requirements.title: Usage-based cost calculator
requirements.description: Estimate monthly cost per scenario based on stored usage profiles and rate cards.

requirements.title: API categorization and tagging
requirements.description: Manage categories/tags with dedicated endpoints and enforce tagging on every API.

requirements.title: Version tracking
requirements.description: Maintain version history, highlight breaking changes, and expose upgrade recommendations.

requirements.title: Integration recipes and snippets
requirements.description: Store code snippets/recipes with voting and attach them to API records.

requirements.title: API status monitoring
requirements.description: Track deprecated/sunset states and surface dedicated status endpoints per API.

requirements.title: Catalog export
requirements.description: Provide JSON and CSV export endpoints plus CLI commands for reporting.

requirements.title: API comparison matrix
requirements.description: Generate comparison matrices that score APIs across capability, cost, and readiness dimensions.

requirements.title: Usage analytics and recommendations
requirements.description: Aggregate usage data per scenario and provide recommendations for optimization.

requirements.title: Webhook notifications
requirements.description: Emit webhooks when API metadata changes so dependent scenarios can react.

requirements.title: Code generator integrations
requirements.description: Provide code-generation endpoints/snippets for bootstraping integrations in dependent scenarios.

requirements.title: API health monitoring
requirements.description: Collect uptime/performance metrics for tracked APIs and expose them via monitoring endpoints.
